quiz.question: Evaluate: ∫ (x ln x) dx.

quiz.subject: Math
quiz.question:
Find the determinant of the matrix:
| 2 3 1 |
| 4 1 5 |
| 7 6 2 |

quiz.subject: Math
quiz.question: If A and B are two square matrices such that AB = I, then what can be said about A and B?
options: A and B are inverse of each other
A is the inverse of B but B is not the inverse of A
A and B are singular matrices
quiz.answer: A and B are inverse of each other

quiz.question:

| 2 1 |
